outputs.output_descr:
•	Establishment of a framework including measures to end post election violence and restore fundamental rights and liberties. 
•	Immediate measures to address humanitarian crisis as well as a framework/ measures for promotion of  reconciliation, healing and restoration.
•	Strategy for the resolution of the current political crisis resulting from the disputed  presidential electoral results.
•	The resolution of long term issues including, constitutional, legal and institutional reform,, framework for tackling poverty, unemployment, inequity as well as combating regional development imbalances; undertaking  land reform; addressing transparency, accountability and impunity; consolidating national cohesion and unity

project_title: 7KEN08312 Support to the Facilitation Efforts PeaceBuild
